member.summary: The selected item in the tree (Optional - default null)

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatTreeView`1.NodeTemplate
member.summary: The template used to render the Node (Required)

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatTreeView`1.GetChildNodesCallback
member.summary: A function that gets all the child nodes for a given parentNode. If lazy loading is supported and the child nodes have not yet been loaded then it should return null. (Required)
member.remarks:
The function should return a collection of child nodes.
This function maybe called many times for a given node.
Loading on Demand If Lazy loading is supported and the child nodes have not been loaded then it should return null. If null is returned then will be called to get the child nodes, to it must have been set.
member.example:
<MatTreeView TNode="MyTreeNode"
                        GetChildNodesCallback="@GetChildNodes" />
            ...
            @code {
                private IEnumerable<MyTreeNode> GetChildNodes(MyTreeNode parentNode)
                {
                    if (parentNode.AreChildrenLoaded == false)
                        return null; // LoadChildrenCallbackAsync will be called to load the child nodes
                        
                    return parentNode.Nodes;
                }
            }

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatTreeView`1.LoadChildNodesCallback
member.summary: A function to lazy load child nodes. Only required if lazy loading / load on demand is used. (Optional - unless returns null)
member.remarks:
This function is called when returns null. This causes this function to be called which should load all the child nodes. The callback is asynchronous and should return when the values have been loaded.
If an error occurs during the loading, then throw an exception (the exceptions message will be shown in the UI). The function many be called again for the same node in order to re-try.
member.example:
<MatTreeView TNode="MyTreeNode"
                        GetChildNodesCallback="@GetChildNodes" 
                        LoadChildNodesCallback="@LoadChildNodesAsync" />
            ...
            @code {
                private IEnumerable<MyTreeNode> GetChildNodes(MyTreeNode parentNode)
                {
                    if (parentNode.AreChildrenLoaded == false)
                        return null; // LoadChildrenCallbackAsync will be called to load the child nodes
                        
                    return parentNode.Nodes;
                }
                
                private Task<IEnumerable<MyTreeNode>> LoadChildNodesAsync(MyTreeNode parentNode)
                {
                    if (parentNode.AreChildrenLoaded == false)
                    {
                        await parentNode.Nodes = MyWebApi.GetChildNodes(parentNode.ID);
                    }
                        
                    return parentNode.Nodes;
                }        
            }

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatTreeView`1.IsNodeExpandedCallback
member.summary: A function that indicates if the given node is expanded or collapsed. (Optional - if null then the expanded/collapsed state is managed by the )
member.example:
<MatTreeView TNode="MyTreeNode"
                        IsNodeExpandedCallback="@((myTreeNode)=>myTreeNode.IsExpanded)" />
            
            or 
            
            <MatTreeView TNode="MyTreeNode"
                        IsNodeExpandedCallback="@IsExpanded" />
            ...
            @code {
                private bool IsExpanded(MyTreeNode myTreeNode)
                {
                    return myTreeNode.IsExpanded;
                }
            }

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatTreeView`1.ExpandStateChanged
member.summary: An event raised when the expanded state of a node changes

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatTreeView`1.SelectedNodeChanged
member.summary: An event raised when the selected node changes

member.name: M:MatBlazor.MatTreeView`1.EnsureSelectedNodeIsVisible
member.summary: Ensures that the selected node is visible, if its not then the selection is moved to the first visible ancestor. If no ancestors exist then its set to null

member.name: T:MatBlazor.LoadChildNodesDelegate`1
member.summary: Callback used to Lazy Load child nodes
member.param: The node to load the child nodes for
member.returns: All the child nodes (should not return null)
member.exception: Throws if the data could not be loaded - the exceptions message will be displayed to the user

member.name: T:MatBlazor.GetChildNodesDelegate`1
member.summary: A Callback used to get the child nodes for a given node
member.param: The node to get the child nodes for
member.returns: The child nodes (if they are loaded) or null if they are not loaded and lazy loading is being used.

member.name: T:MatBlazor.BaseMatVirtualScroll`1
member.summary: The VirtualScroll for Blazor displays large lists of elements performantly by only rendering the items that fit on-screen. Loading hundreds of elements can be slow in any browser; virtual scrolling enables a performant way to simulate all items being rendered by making the height of the container element the same as the height of total number of elements to be rendered, and then only rendering the items in view.

member.name: M:MatBlazor.LinqExtensions.FindIndex``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Finds the index of the first item matching an expression in an enumerable.
member.param: The expression to test the items against.
member.returns: The index of the first matching item, or -1 if no items match.

member.name: M:MatBlazor.LinqExtensions.IndexOf``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},``0)
member.summary: Finds the index of the first occurrence of an item in an enumerable.
member.returns: The index of the first matching item, or -1 if the item was not found.

member.name: T:MatBlazor.MatToastCommonOptions
member.summary: The common options for MatToaster

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastCommonOptions.Class
member.summary: The main toast class. Defaults to

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastCommonOptions.MaximumOpacity
member.summary: The maximum opacity expressed as an integer percentage for a toast in the Visible state. Defaults to 80% where 0 means completely hidden and 100 means solid color.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastCommonOptions.ShowTransitionDuration
member.summary: How long the showing transition takes to bring a toast to the MaximumOpacity and set it to the Visible state. Defaults to 500 ms.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastCommonOptions.ShowStepDuration
member.summary: Interval between component repaint during the showing transition. Defaults to 100 ms.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastCommonOptions.VisibleStateDuration
member.summary: How long the toast remain visible without user interaction. Defaults to 5000 ms.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastCommonOptions.HideTransitionDuration
member.summary: How long the hiding transition takes to make a toast disappear. Defaults to 500 ms.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastCommonOptions.HideStepDuration
member.summary: Interval between component repaint during the hiding transition. Defaults to 100 ms.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastCommonOptions.ShowProgressBar
member.summary: States if a progressbar has to be shown during the toast Visible state. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastCommonOptions.ProgressBarStepDuration
member.summary: Interval between component repaint during the Visible state: it's used only if ShowProgressBar is true. Defaults to 50 ms.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastCommonOptions.ShowCloseButton
member.summary: States if the close button has to be used for hiding a toast. The button presence disables the default "hide on click" behaviour. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastCommonOptions.CloseIcon
member.summary: The css class for the close icon. Defaults to .

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastCommonOptions.RequireInteraction
member.summary: When true it disables the auto hiding and forces the user to interact with the toast for closing it. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:MatBlazor.MatToastConfiguration
member.summary: Represents the global instance

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastConfiguration.NewestOnTop
member.summary: Drives the toast display sequence: when true the newest displayable toast will be on top. Otherwise it will be on the bottom. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastConfiguration.PreventDuplicates
member.summary: When true, a new toast with the same type, title and message of an already present toast will be ignored. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastConfiguration.MaxDisplayedToasts
member.summary: The maximum number of toasts to be displayed at the same time. Defaults to 5

member.name: P:MatBlazor.MatToastConfiguration.Position
member.summary: The css class driving the toast position in the screen. The predefined positions are contained in . Defaults to
